Uses of Class
hypervisorManager.HypervisorOperationException

  • Packages that use HypervisorOperationException 
    Package Description
    hypervisorManager
    In this package are located all classes to manage hypervisor processes to configure and execute images
    virtualMachineManager.configuration
    In this package are located all classes to configure virtual machines based in operating system
    virtualMachineManager.entities
    In this package are located all entities used in agent to save and control information
